Interface OrderDao

public interface OrderDao
extends BaseDao<Order>
The interface for working with database table orders

    • updateStatus

      boolean updateStatus​(java.lang.String orderId, OrderStatus statusFrom, OrderStatus statusTo) throws DaoException
      Updates order status
      Parameters:
      orderId - String order id
      statusFrom - OrderStatus current order status
      statusTo - OrderStatus new order status
      Returns:
      boolean true if the status has been updated, else false
      Throws:
      DaoException - if ConnectionPoolException or SQLException occur
